name: Checkpoint (JLV)
description:
Checkpoint is an escape game / point'n click game developed during Ludum Dare 43.

You wake up locked up in a strange place, alone with two other unknown people. Find the culprit and escape !

Controls : WASD/Arrows to browse the menus/walk, E to talk, SPACE to use the sword. (Due to the controls of the game being solely on the keyboard, please ensure that your browser is focused on the game.)
